headline: PSEG recommends shareholders reject "mini-tender" offer by TRC Capital Investment Corporation
summary: Public Service Enterprise Group (NYSE: PEG) today announced that it has received notice of an unsolicited mini-tender offer by TRC Capital Investment Corporation of Ontario, Canada, to purchase up to 1.5 million shares of PSEG common stock at a price of $80.60 per share.
